attributes.action: Ban all parliamentary recesses until a Brexit deal has been agreed
attributes.additional_details: In the real world, we wouldn't be allowed on holiday if we hadn't done our work, the same should apply to MPs
attributes.background: The Prime Minister and her team have made a complete mess of the Brexit negotiations. They should not be allowed to rise for an Easter (or any) recess until a Brexit deal has been agreed and passed through Parliament.
